info.description:
RCABench - A comprehensive root cause analysis benchmarking platform for microservices
This API provides endpoints for managing datasets, algorithms, evaluations, and fault injections
for root cause analysis in distributed systems and microservices architectures.
info.title: RCABench API

get.description: Virtual endpoint for including all DTO type definitions in Swagger documentation. DO NOT USE in production.

post.description: Change password for authenticated user
Authenticate user with username and password
Logout user and invalidate token

get.description: Get profile information for authenticated user

post.description: Refresh an existing JWT token
Register a new user account

get.description: Get paginated list of containers with pagination and filtering

post.description: Create a new container without build configuration.
Submit a container build task to build a container image from provided source files.
Search containers with complex filtering, sorting and pagination. Supports all container types (algorithm, benchmark, etc.)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific container

delete.description: Delete a container (soft delete by setting status to -1)

patch.description: Add or remove custom labels (key-value pairs) for a container

400.description: Invalid container ID or invalid request format/parameters

get.description: Get paginated list of container versions for a specific container

post.description: Create a new container version for an existing container.

400.description: Invalid container ID or invalid request format or parameters

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific container version

delete.description: Delete a container version (soft delete by setting status to false)

400.description: Invalid container ID or container version ID

patch.description: Update an existing container version's information

get.description: Get paginated list of datasets with pagination and filtering

post.description: Create a new dataset with an initial version

post.description: Create a new dataset version for an existing dataset.

delete.description: Delete a dataset version (soft delete by setting status to false)

400.description: Invalid dataset ID/dataset version ID/request format/request parameters

get.description: Download dataset file by version ID

post.description: Retrieve evaluation data for multiple algorithm-datapack pairs.

parameters.description: Batch evaluation request containing multiple algorithm-datapack pairs
parameters.name: request

200.description: Batch algorithm datapack evaluation data retrieved successfully

post.description: Retrieve evaluation data for multiple algorithm-dataset pairs.

parameters.description: Batch evaluation request containing multiple algorithm-dataset pairs
parameters.name: request

200.description: Batch algorithm dataset evaluation data retrieved successfully

get.description: Get a paginated list of executions with pagination and filtering

parameters.description: Filter by labels (array of key:value strings, e.g., 'type:test')
parameters.name: labels

post.description: Batch delete executions by IDs or labels with cascading deletion of related records
Submit multiple algorithm execution tasks in batch. Supports mixing datapack (v1 compatible) and dataset (v2 feature) executions.

404.description: Project, algorithm, datapack or dataset not found

get.description: List all available label keys for executions

post.description: Upload detection results for detector algorithm via API instead of file collection

400.description: Invalid executionID or invalid request format or parameters

post.description: Upload granularity results for regular algorithms via API instead of file collection

400.description: Invalid exeuction ID or invalid request form or parameters

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific execution

patch.description: Add or remove custom labels (key-value pairs) for an execution

400.description: Invalid execution ID or request format/parameters

get.description: Get a paginated list of injections with pagination and filtering

parameters.description: Filter by labels (array of key:value strings, e.g., 'type:chaos')
parameters.name: labels

get.description: Query all fault injection records without issues based on time range, returning detailed records including configuration information
get.summary: Query Fault Injection Records Without Issues

parameters.description: Filter by labels (array of key:value strings, e.g., 'type:chaos')
parameters.name: labels

parameters.description: Time range query, supports custom relative time (1h/24h/7d) or custom, default not set
parameters.name: lookback

parameters.description: Custom start time, RFC3339 format, required when lookback=custom
parameters.name: custom_start_time

parameters.description: Custom end time, RFC3339 format, required when lookback=custom
parameters.name: custom_end_time

200.description: Successfully returned fault injection records without issues

400.description: Request parameter error, such as incorrect time format or parameter validation failure, etc.

get.description: Query all fault injection records with issues based on time range
get.summary: Query Fault Injection Records With Issues

parameters.description: Filter by labels (array of key:value strings, e.g., 'type:chaos')
parameters.name: labels

parameters.description: Time range query, supports custom relative time (1h/24h/7d) or custom, default not set
parameters.name: lookback

parameters.description: Custom start time, RFC3339 format, required when lookback=custom
parameters.name: custom_start_time

parameters.description: Custom end time, RFC3339 format, required when lookback=custom
parameters.name: custom_end_time

400.description: Request parameter error, such as incorrect time format or parameter validation failure, etc.

Submit multiple fault injection tasks in batch
